about_the_game:
Nightmare Pursuit plunges you into a chilling multiplayer horror experience where survival is the only goal. As a survivor, you and your team must evade the relentless pursuit of horrifying killers, each drawn from a dark past and armed with unique abilities. In a game where every encounter can be a matter of life or death, players must navigate through a series of meticulously crafted environments, each echoing with the twisted histories of its inhabitants.

Whether you’re hiding from the malevolent gaze of the Enchantress in her shadowy mansion, dodging the Farmer’s brutal traps in his claustrophobic farmhouse, or outwitting the Ringmaster in his nightmarish sewers, every step you take is fraught with danger. The killers are not only hunting you but are also connected to their environments in ways that could either be your downfall or your salvation.

Team up with other players to strategize and survive, or go it alone and rely on your instincts and quick thinking. Use every resource at your disposal to survive. Nightmare Pursuit is not just a game; it’s a test of wits, nerves, and survival instincts. Can you outlast the nightmare and escape? Or will you become another victim of the darkness?

Key Features


  • Intense Multiplayer Horror: Experience heart-pounding gameplay where every decision could be the difference between life and death.
  • Unique Killers: Face off against a roster of chilling killers, each with distinct abilities and lore.
  • Diverse Maps: Explore a variety of atmospheric environments, from the opulent yet ominous mansion of the Enchantress to the twisted funhouse of the Ringmaster.
  • Survivor Strategies: Use stealth, speed, and teamwork to outmaneuver the killers. Every choice matters as you seek to escape the nightmare.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Engage in thrilling cat-and-mouse chases, avoid deadly traps, and use environmental knowledge to survive.

    Are you ready to face your fears? Enter the world of Nightmare Pursuit and test your wits and courage against the ultimate nightmares.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains intense horror themes, including graphic depictions of violence, blood, and gore. Players will encounter disturbing environments and frightening scenarios that may be unsettling. The game also features strong themes of psychological trauma. Due to the nature of cooperative gameplay, players may experience heightened fear and anxiety when working together to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core 7. Gen
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Rely on stealth, strategy, and teamwork to survive in horrific environments. Experience the thrill of the chase—escape or become the hunted.
